definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. as adj. (precise mng. dub.; Ar. wa9aza is give a nod or sign, then command, whence Heb. might have meaning nodding, making signs (not intelligibly speaking), so Hi—Che barbarous, De ‘ungeberdig’—which context favours, or arrogant; Thes prop. durus, saevus, and comp. [[עזז]])—in phr. [[עַם נוֹעָז]] Is 33:19 a barbarous (?) people, of foreign invader.
